Text.Page:
The Temple of Dagon is a test of courage, but one I think you're up to.

Get some supplies from {@LinkCreature:75#1002#Dyanne} and deliver them to {@LinkCreature:242#1008#Langbau} at Camp Venom.

On your way, clear out as many of those accursed {@LinkCreature:42#510#hounds of Dagon} as you can manage. It will make things a little safer for everyone.
You've come for the supplies then. Don't worry about paying meâ€”just come back alive.

Supplies! We really needed these. Not all messengers get through the hounds. They eat well.

Now I'll distribute these and let you do your job. Strange things going on with the nagas lately. I'm sure you'll hear all about it.
